string-array.name: QandAs
string-array.item: Q: App does not connect to the IP camera

A: Check whether you have correctly mentioned http:// or https:// or rtsp:// before the url and the port number by default the port number of motionEye is 8765, you may also enter port number 8081 for streaming only
Q: motionEye links cannot be opened as global links/port forwarded

A: To access global links, first enable port forwarding in the WiFi router to which motionEye device is connected, for step by step guide checkout this link: https://github.com/ccrisan/motioneyeos/issues/58
Q: My WiFi router does not support Port forwarding but I want to access my camera globally
A: Check out https://www.dataplicity.com/ they have an awesome method to make your motionEye device available globally without actual port forwarding
Q: I am facing an unmentioned problem
A: Please consider contacting us on our feedback mail in the About section before rating the app, we will fix the issue as soon as possible
